videoData.title: A data translation toolkit that anyone can use
videoData.socialTitle: A data translation toolkit that anyone can use

nodes.whoTheyAre: At PVH Asia Pacific, Jonathan Koch builds the Tommy Hilfiger and Calvin Klein businesses through strategic planning, implementing growth initiatives, and evolving business models and processes. Throughout his career, he has learned to distinguish good data from bad data, and in the process has developed the skills to transform data into useful insights. Koch holds a bachelor's degree in History and International Studies from Yale University. Having lived on three continents, he is an avid traveler and language connoisseur.

videoData.description: Every day, we're inundated with heaps of data and no easy way to decipher it. It's easy to feel overwhelmed in the face of this avalanche of information. With three simple tools, Jonathan Koch outlines how each of us can better understand data to make more informed decisions in our professional and personal lives.
videoData.socialDescription: Every day, we're inundated with heaps of data and no easy way to decipher it. It's easy to feel overwhelmed in the face of this avalanche of information. With three simple tools, Jonathan Koch outlines how each of us can better understand data to make more informed decisions in our professional and personal lives.
